package cn.itach.telegram;import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;import androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager;import androidx.fragment.app.FragmentTransaction;import android.os.Bundle;import android.view.View;import android.widget.Button;import android.widget.LinearLayout;import cn.itach.telegram.LoginUi.LoginFragment;import cn.itach.telegram.LoginUi.LoginedFragment;public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity implements View.OnClickListener {    private Button login_btn;    private Button back_login_btn;    private Fragment loginFragment;    private Fragment loginedFragment;    @Override    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);        // åœ¨onCreateåˆå§‹åŒ–Fragment        loginFragment = new LoginFragment();        loginedFragment = new LoginedFragment();        // å°†æ‰€æœ‰fragmentæ·»åŠ åˆ°MainActivityä¸­        addAllLoginFragment();        showLogin();    }    @Override    protected void onStart() {        super.onStart();        initFragmentListener();    }    private void initFragmentListener() {        // åœ¨onStartä¸­è·å–åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰fragmentçš„æ§ä»¶        login_btn = loginFragment.getView().findViewById(R.id.login_btn);        back_login_btn = loginedFragment.getView().findViewById(R.id.back_login);        // ç›‘å¬fragmenetä¸­æ§ä»¶çš„ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶        login_btn.setOnClickListener(this);        back_login_btn.setOnClickListener(this);    }    // å°†æ‰€æœ‰fragmentæ·»åŠ åˆ°MainActivityä¸­    public void addAllLoginFragment() {        FragmentManager fragmentManager = getSupportFragmentManager();        FragmentTransaction transaction = fragmentManager.beginTransaction();        transaction.add(R.id.login_body,loginFragment).add(R.id.login_body,loginedFragment);        transaction.commit();    }    // æ§åˆ¶ä¸¤ä¸ªfragmentçš„éšè—ä¸æ˜¾ç¤º    private void showLogin() {        FragmentManager fragmentManager = getSupportFragmentManager();        FragmentTransaction transaction = fragmentManager.beginTransaction();        transaction.hide(loginedFragment);        transaction.show(loginFragment);        transaction.commit();    }    // æ§åˆ¶ä¸¤ä¸ªfragmentçš„éšè—ä¸æ˜¾ç¤º    private void showLogined() {        FragmentManager fragmentManager = getSupportFragmentManager();        FragmentTransaction transaction = fragmentManager.beginTransaction();        transaction.hide(loginFragment);        transaction.show(loginedFragment);        transaction.commit();    }    // ç›‘å¬ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶    @Override    public void onClick(View view) {        switch (view.getId()) {            case R.id.login_btn:                showLogined();                break;            case R.id.back_login:                showLogin();                break;        }    }}

ç»™ä½ ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°æ•°ç»„ fruits ï¼Œè¿”å›ä½ å¯ä»¥æ”¶é›†çš„æ°´æœçš„ æœ€å¤§ æ•°ç›®ã€‚

åŠ¨çª—å£ï¼Œç»´æŠ¤leftå’Œrightï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å–ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ä½œä¸ºåŸºå‡†ï¼Œrightå‘å³æ»‘åŠ¨ Â·Â·å¦‚æœfruits[right]ä¸æ˜¯å…¶ä¸­çš„å°±æ›´æ–°æ–°çš„æ•°ä¸ºåŸºå‡†å°†leftç›´æ¥ç§»åŠ¨åˆ°rightå‰é¢ä¸€æ ¼ï¼Œç„¶åå†å‘å‰æ‰¾leftç›¸ç­‰çš„æœ€å‰é¢çš„å®šä½leftã€‚ Â·Â·å¦‚æœfruits[right]æ˜¯å…¶ä¸­çš„å°±æ›´æ–°res

func totalFruit(fruits []int) int {    cnt := map[int]int{}    left := 0    res := 0    for right, x := range fruits {        cnt[x]++        for len(cnt) > 2 {            y := fruits[left]            cnt[y]--            if cnt[y] == 0 {                delete(cnt, y)            }            left++        }        res = MAX(res, right-left+1)    }    return res}func MAX(a int, b int) int {    if a > b {        return a    }    return b}

<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head>    <meta charset="UTF-8">    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">    <link rel="icon" type="image/jpg" href="/img/favicon.jpg"/>    <title>MyHoney</title>    <style type="text/css">        *{            margin: 0;            padding: 0;            text-decoration: none;            list-style: none;        }        #banner{            width: 400px;            height: 400px;            border: 2px solid #999;            overflow: hidden;            position: relative;        }        #imglist{            width: 2000px;            height: 400px;        }        #imglist img{            width: 400px;            height: 400px;        }        #imglist li{            float: left;        }        .prev{            background: #666;            width: 30px;            height: 40px;            color: #fff;            text-align: center;            line-height: 40px;            position: absolute;            left: 5px;            top: 45%;            cursor: pointer;        }        .next{            background: #666;            width: 30px;            height: 40px;            color: #fff;            text-align: center;            line-height: 40px;            position: absolute;            right: 5px;            top: 45%;            cursor: pointer;        }        #icolist{            position: absolute;            right: 10px;            bottom: 10px;        }        #icolist li{            width: 30px;            height: 30px;            border-radius: 50%;            background: #666;            text-align: center;            line-height: 30px;            color: #fff;            float: left;            margin-left: 2.5px;            cursor: pointer;        }        body{                        background: #FFE4B5;        }        #bg{            position: absolute;            top: 30px;            left: 30px;        }        h2{            text-align: center;            color: #FF82AB;        }        #kawayi{            text-align: center;            color: #FFBBFF;            top: 5px;            left: 5px;        }    </style></head><body>    <div id="bg">        <h2>è¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘çš„å®è´å¥³æœ‹å‹</h2>    <div id="banner" >        <ul id="imglist">            <li><img src="img/cqy1.jpg" alt=""></li>            <li><img src="img/cqy2.jpg" alt=""></li>            <li><img src="img/cqy3.jpg" alt=""></li>            <li><img src="img/cqy4.jpg" alt=""></li>            <li><img src="img/cqy1.jpg" alt=""></li>        </ul>        <ul id="icolist">            <li>1</li>            <li>2</li>            <li>3</li>            <li>4</li>        </ul>        <div class="prev">ã€Š</div>        <div class="next">ã€‹</div>    </div>        <h3 id="kawayi">å¥¹æ²¡æœ‰å¤±è¸ª åªæ˜¯è§‰å¾—å¥¹å¾ˆå¯çˆ± æƒ³è®©å¤§å®¶è®¤è¯†ä¸€ä¸‹</h3>    </div>    <script>        var eprev = document.querySelector('.prev');        var enext = document.querySelector('.next');        var esico = document.getElementById('icolist').getElementsByTagName('li');        var eicolist = document.querySelector('#icolist');        var eimglist = document.querySelector('#imglist');        var left = 0;        var timer;        run();        function run() {            if (left <= -1600) {                left = 0;            }            var m = Math.floor(-left / 400);    // m ä¸ºå°åœ†ç‚¹çš„index            imglist.style.marginLeft = left + "px";            // æ·»åŠ å˜é‡n æ»šå®Œä¸€å¼ ç…§ç‰‡åœ1200æ¯«ç§’            var n = (left % 400 == 0) ? 1200 : 10;            left -= 10;            timer = setTimeout(run,n);            icoChange(m);   // å°†å¯¹åº”å°åœ†ç‚¹å˜çº¢        }        // å›¾ç‰‡å®šä½å‡½æ•°        function imgChange(n) {            let lt = - (n * 400);            imglist.style.marginLeft = lt + "px";            left = lt;        }        eprev.onclick = function() {            let prevgo = Math.floor(-left / 400) - 1;            if (prevgo == -1) {                prevgo = 3;            }            imgChange(prevgo);        }        enext.onclick = function() {            let nextgo = Math.floor(-left / 400) + 1;            if (nextgo == 4) {                nextgo = 0;            }            imgChange(nextgo);        }        function icoChange(m) {            for (let index = 0; index < esico.length; index++) {                esico[index].style.backgroundColor = '';            }            if (m < esico.length) {                esico[m].style.backgroundColor = 'red';            }        }        eicolist.onclick = function () {            var tg = event.target;            let ico = tg.innerHTML - 1;            imgChange(ico);            icoChange(ico);        }        eimglist.onmouseover = function () {            clearTimeout(timer);        }        eimglist.onmouseout = function () {            run();        }            </script></body></html>

i < 5; i++ {        // ks[i].weight = int_weight[i]        // ks[i].value = int_value[i]        // ks[i].profit = 0        ks[i] = &knapsack{index: i + 1, weight: int_weight[i], value: int_value[i], profit: 0}    }    return &ks}// func (ks ks) initgk(int_weight, int_value []int) {// for i := 0; i < len(int_weight); i++ {// ks[i].weight = int_weight[i]// ks[i].value = int_value[i]// ks[i].profit = 0// }// }func (ks *Ks) ComputeRatio() {    r := *ks    for i := 0; i < 5; i++ {        w := (r[i]).weight        v := (r[i]).value        index := (r[i]).index        var p float64 = float64(v) / float64(w)        r[i] = &knapsack{index: index, weight: w, value: v, profit: p}    }}// æ ¹æ®å•ä½é‡é‡çš„æ”¶ç›Šå€¼æ¯”å¤§å°ï¼Œå¯¹ç‰©å“è¿›è¡Œæ’åºfunc (ks *Ks) SortRatio() {    r := *ks    for i := 0; i < 5; i++ {        for j := i + 1; j < 5; j++ {            if (r[j]).profit > (r[i]).profit {                temp := r[i]                r[i] = r[j]                r[j] = temp            }        }    }}// æŒ‰èƒŒåŒ…ç‰©å“indexæ’åº// è®¡ç®—èƒŒåŒ…é—®é¢˜çš„æœ€ä¼˜è§£å’Œæ‰€æ”¾ç‰©å“çš„æœ€å¤§æ”¶ç›Šfunc (ks *Ks) ComputeProfit() (float64, map[int]float64) {    var temp int = 0    var i int = 0    r := *ks    xi := make(map[int]float64, 5)    for {        if !(temp <= Capacity) {            break        }        if i == 5 {            break        } else {            if (r[i].weight + temp) <= Capacity {                profit += (float64)(r[i].value)                temp += r[i].weight                xi[r[i].index] = float64(r[i].weight) / float64(Capacity)            } else {                var _weight int = Capacity - temp                profit += (float64)(_weight) / (float64)(r[i].profit)                temp += _weight                xi[r[i].index] = float64(_weight) / float64(Capacity)            }        }        i++    }    return profit, xi}

package Algor01;import java.security.spec.KeySpec;public class Greedyknapsack {//    å®šä¹‰å±æ€§ã€å¯¹è±¡å’Œæ–¹æ³•    public static int  Capacity;    public static double Profit;    public String[] Xi = new String[5];    public knapsack[] Ks;    // åˆå§‹åŒ–å¯¹è±¡    public class knapsack {        int index;        int weight;        int value;        double profit;        knapsack(){}        knapsack(int i,int w,int v, double p){            index = i;            weight = w;            value = v;            profit = p;        }    }    public Greedyknapsack(){    }    public Greedyknapsack(int C,double P){        Capacity = C;        Profit = P;    }    // åˆå§‹åŒ–ç‰©å“ä»¬    public knapsack[] InitKs(int[] w,int[] v){        Ks = new knapsack[5];        for(int i = 0;i<5;i++){            knapsack k = new knapsack(i+1,w[i],v[i],0);            Ks[i] = k;        }        return Ks;    }    // è®¡ç®—å‡ºå•ä¸ªç‰©å“çš„profit    public void ComputeRatio(){        for(int i=0;i<5;i++){            double p = (double)(Ks[i].value) / (double)(Ks[i].weight);            Ks[i].profit = p;        }    }    // æ ¹æ®å•ä½é‡é‡çš„æ”¶ç›Šå€¼æ¯”å¤§å°ï¼Œå¯¹ç‰©å“è¿›è¡Œæ’åºSortRatio    public void SortRatio() {        knapsack temp;        for(int i=0;i<5;i++){            for(int j=i+1;j<5;j++){                if (Ks[j].profit > Ks[i].profit){                    temp = Ks[i];                    Ks[i] = Ks[j];                    Ks[j] = temp;                }            }        }    }    // è®¡ç®—èƒŒåŒ…é—®é¢˜çš„æœ€ä¼˜è§£å’Œæ‰€æ”¾ç‰©å“çš„æœ€å¤§æ”¶ç›Š    public double ComputeProfit() {        int temp = 0;        int i = 0;        while (temp <= Capacity) {            if (i == 5)                break;            else {                if ((Ks[i].weight + temp) <= Capacity ) {                    Profit += (double)(Ks[i].value);                    temp += Ks[i].weight;                    Xi[Ks[i].index-1] = "ç‰©å“:" + (Ks[i].index) + " å¯¹åº”æ¯”ä¾‹:" + ((double)Ks[i].weight / (double) Capacity);                } else {                    int _weight = Capacity - temp;                    Profit += (double)(_weight) / (double)(Ks[i].profit);                    temp += _weight;                    Xi[Ks[i].index-1] = "ç‰©å“:" + (Ks[i].index) + " å¯¹åº”æ¯”ä¾‹:" + ((double)_weight / (double) Capacity);                }            }            i++;        }        return Profit;    }}

#include "stdio.h"#include "stdlib.h"#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int Status;typedef int ElemType;typedef struct node{    ElemType data;    struct node *next;}Node,*LinkList;/*InitListåˆå§‹åŒ–é“¾è¡¨çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–æˆåŠŸé¡»è¿”å›å¤´ç»“ç‚¹çš„åœ°å€*/LinkList InitList(){    Node *head;    head=(Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node));    head->next=NULL;    return head;}/*åˆ›å»ºå…·æœ‰nä¸ªç»“ç‚¹çš„å•é“¾è¡¨*/void CreateList(LinkList L,int n){    Node *r,*s;    int i;    r=L;    for(i=0;i<n;i++)    {        s=(Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node));        scanf("%d",&s->data);        s->next=NULL;                r->next=s;        r=s;    }}/*å•é“¾è¡¨æ•°æ®çš„è¾“å‡ºæ“ä½œ*/void PrintList(LinkList L){    Node *r=L;    printf("é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®:");    while(r->next!=NULL)    {        printf("%d ",r->next->data);        r=r->next;    }    printf("
");    return;}/*æ±‚å•é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦*/int LengthList(LinkList L){    Node *r=L;    int counter=0;    while(r->next!=NULL)    {        counter++;        r=r->next;    }        return counter;}/*å•é“¾è¡¨çš„æ’å…¥æ“ä½œ*/Status InsertList(LinkList L,int i,ElemType e){    Node *r,*s;    int j;    r=L;    if(i<1||i>LengthList(L)+1)    return FALSE;    for(j=0;j<i-1;j++)    {        r=r->next;    }        s=(Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node));    s->data=e;        s->next=r->next;/*å…ˆè¿æ¥åé¢ï¼Œå†è¿æ¥å‰é¢ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½ä¿è¯ç¬¬iä¸ªä½ç½®çš„æŒ‡é’ˆä¸ä¸¢å¤±*/    r->next=s;        return TRUE;}/*å•é“¾è¡¨çš„åˆ é™¤æ“ä½œ*/Status DeleteList(LinkList L,int i){    Node *r,*s;    int j;    r=L;    if(i<1||i>LengthList(L))    return FALSE;    /*è®©ræŒ‡å‘é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„ç¬¬i-1ä¸ªä½ç½®*/    for(j=0;j<i-1;j++)    {        r=r->next;    }        /*åˆ é™¤ç¬¬iä¸ªä½ç½®çš„ç»“ç‚¹*/    s=r->next;    r->next=s->next;        free(s);/*é‡Šæ”¾æ‰€åˆ é™¤çš„ç»“ç‚¹*/        return TRUE;}void main(){       LinkList L;       L=InitList();       CreateList(L,5);       /*PrintList(L);       printf("å½“å‰é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦æ˜¯:%d
",LengthList(L));       */       InsertList(L,3,1000);       PrintList(L);       printf("å½“å‰é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦æ˜¯:%d
",LengthList(L));       DeleteList(L,2);       DeleteList(L,5);       PrintList(L);       printf("å½“å‰é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦æ˜¯:%d
",LengthList(L));}

#include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>#define TRUE 1#define FALSE 0typedef int Status;typedef int ElemType;typedef struct node{    ElemType data;    struct node *next;}Node,*LinkList;//å•é“¾è¡¨çš„åˆå§‹åŒ–InitListLinkList InitList(){    Node *head;    head = (Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node));    head ->next = NULL;    return head;}//å•é“¾è¡¨çš„åˆ›å»ºvoid CreateList(LinkList L, int n){    Node *r,*s;    int i;    r=L;    for(i = 0;i < n;i++){        s = (Node *)malloc(sizeof(Node));        scanf("%d",&s->data);        s->next=NULL;        r->next = s;        r=s;    }}//è¾“å‡ºå•é“¾è¡¨void PrintList(LinkList L){    Node *r;    r=L;    printf("é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯: ");    while(r->next != NULL){        r=r->next;        printf("%d ",r->data);    }    printf("\n");}//å•é“¾è¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦int LengthList(LinkList L){    Node *r;    int count;    r=L;    while(r->next !=NULL){        r=r->next;        count++;    }    return count;}//å•é“¾è¡¨çš„æ’å…¥Status InsertList(LinkList L, int i,ElemType e){    Node *r,*s;    int j;    r=L;    // åˆ¤æ–­ iä¸å°äº 1 ä¸å¤§äº é“¾è¡¨é•¿åº¦ +1    if(i<1 || i> LengthList(L) + 1){        return FALSE;    }    // æŠŠræŒ‡é’ˆç§»åˆ°i-1ä½ç½®    for(j=0;j<i-1;j++){        r=r->next;    }    // åˆå§‹åŒ–æ’å…¥çš„node èµ‹ç»™ s    s = (Node *) malloc(sizeof(Node));    s->data = e;    // æ’å…¥s    s->next = r->next;  // å°†iåé¢çš„node(i+1) æ¥åˆ°s(i)å    r->next = s;        // å°†sæ¥åˆ°r(i-1)å    return TRUE;}//åˆ é™¤å•é“¾è¡¨çš„ç»“ç‚¹DeleteList æŒ‰ç´¢å¼•å€¼åˆ é™¤Status DeleteList(LinkList L,int i){    Node *r,*s;    int j;    r=L;    if(i<1 || i> LengthList(L)){        return FALSE;    }    // å°† r ç§»åˆ° i-1 çš„ä½ç½®    for(j=0;j<i-1;j++){        r=r->next;    }    s = r->next;    r->next = s->next;    printf("åˆ é™¤ç¬¬%dä¸ªç»“ç‚¹æˆåŠŸ,åˆ é™¤çš„å€¼ä¸º%d\n",i,s->data);    free(s);    return TRUE;}//æŒ‰ç´¢å¼•å–å•é“¾è¡¨ä¸­çš„å€¼ElemType GetElem(LinkList L,int i){    Node *r;    r = L;    if(i<1 || i> LengthList(L))        return FALSE;    // å°†ræŒ‡é’ˆç§»åˆ°iä½ç½®    for(int j=0;j<i;j++){        r = r->next;    }    return r->data;}//æ ¹æ®å€¼eåˆ é™¤Status DelList(LinkList L,ElemType e){    Node *r,*s;    r = L;    while(r->next != NULL){        if(r->next->data == e){            s = r->next;            r->next=s->next;            printf("åˆ é™¤%dæˆåŠŸ\n",e);            free(s);        }        r=r->next;  // ræŒ‡é’ˆå‘åç§»åŠ¨    }    return TRUE;}// åˆ é™¤å•é“¾è¡¨çš„å°¾ç»“ç‚¹void DeleteEnd(LinkList L){    Node *r,*s;    r = L;    s= L;    int i;    // å°†æŒ‡é’ˆræŒªåˆ°é“¾è¡¨æœ«å°¾    while(r->next !=NULL){        r = r->next;    }    // å°†æŒ‡é’ˆsæŒªåˆ°rçš„å‰é¢ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹    while(s->next !=r && s->next !=NULL){        s = s->next;    }    s->next = r->next;    free(r);}// åˆ é™¤å¤´ç»“ç‚¹void DelHead(LinkList L){    Node *r,*s;    r=L;    s=L;    // å°†æŒ‡é’ˆræŒªåˆ°é“¾è¡¨æœ«å°¾    while(r->next !=NULL) {        r = r->next;    }    // å°†æŒ‡é’ˆsæŒªåˆ°rçš„å‰é¢ä¸€ä¸ªç»“ç‚¹    while(s->next !=r && s->next !=NULL){        s = s->next;    }    // åˆ é™¤å¤´ç»“ç‚¹    if(r == s){        free(r);    }}// å°†å•é“¾è¡¨Lé”€æ¯ DestroyListvoid DestroyList(LinkList L){    while(LengthList(L)>1){        DeleteEnd(L);    }    DelHead(L);}// å°†å•é“¾è¡¨Læ¸…ç©ºvoid ClearList(LinkList L){    while(LengthList(L)>1){        DeleteEnd(L);    }}int main() {    LinkList L;    L = InitList();    CreateList(L,5);    PrintList(L);    // æ’å…¥æ•°æ®    InsertList(L,3,999);    PrintList(L);    // æ ¹æ®ç´¢å¼•(i)åˆ é™¤    DeleteList(L,2);    DeleteList(L,5); package mainimport (    "fmt")//å…«çš‡åé—®é¢˜//è®°å½•æ‰“å°æ€»æ¬¡æ•°var count int = 0//ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„è¡¨ç¤ºæ£‹ç›˜ ç¬¬iä¸ªå…ƒç´ è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬iä¸ªçš‡åï¼Œç¬¬iè¡Œï¼Œå€¼è¡¨ç¤ºè¯¥çš‡ååœ¨ç¬¬å‡ åˆ—var data []int = make([]int, 8)func main(){        put(0)    fmt.Println(count)}//æ€è·¯ï¼š é¦–å…ˆï¼Œéœ€è¦æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¾ç½®çš‡åçš„æ–¹æ³•func put(n int){    //å½“æ”¾ç½®çš„nä¸º8æ—¶ï¼Œå³ä¸ºç¬¬9ä¸ªçš‡å  å› ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»0å¼€å§‹    if (n == 8){        // fmt.Println(data)        fmt.Printf("æ–¹æ¡ˆ%d:",count+1)        for i:=0 ; i <8; i++{            fmt.Printf(" %dè¡Œ%dåˆ— ",i+1,data[i]+1)        }        fmt.Println()        count++        return    }    //å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯ç¬¬9ä¸ªçš‡åï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±éå†æ¥æ”¾ç½®ç¬¬1åˆ°8ä¸ªçš‡å    for i := 0; i < 8; i ++{        //å…ˆæŠŠå½“å‰çš„å­n æ”¾åœ¨iè¿™ä¸ªä½ç½®ä¸Š        data[n] = i        //åˆ¤æ–­è¯¥ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œè½å­        if (check(n)){            put(n + 1)        }    }}//æ£€æŸ¥çš‡åæ˜¯å¦åœ¨åŒä¸€åˆ—æˆ–è€…åœ¨åŒä¸€æ–œçº¿func check(n int) bool{    for i := 0; i < n; i++{        //ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª data[i] == data[n]  æˆ‘ä»¬æ­¤å¤„ç”¨ä¸‹æ ‡ä»£è¡¨ç¬¬å‡ è¡Œ  ç”¨æ•°å€¼ä»£è¡¨ç¬¬å‡ åˆ—  é‚£ä¹ˆå½“ç¬¬iè¡Œçš„çš‡åä¸ç¬¬nè¡Œçš„çš‡ååœ¨åŒä¸€åˆ—        //å°±ä¸ç¬¦åˆé¢˜æ„äº†        //ç¬¬äºŒä¸ª  abs(data[n] - data[i]) == abs(i - n)   n å’Œ iä»£è¡¨çš‡åçš„æ¨ªåæ ‡  data[n] data[i]ä»£è¡¨çš‡åçš„çºµåæ ‡  é‚£ä¹ˆä¸¤ä¸ªçš‡åæ¨ªåæ ‡ç›¸å‡  çºµåæ ‡ç›¸å‡ç›¸åŒæ—¶        //å…¶ä¸¤ä¸ªçš‡åæ„æˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªä¸æ£‹ç›˜45Â°çš„å¤¹è§’ï¼Œæ£‹ç›˜æ˜¯æ­£æ–¹å½¢ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ æ­¤æ—¶ä¸¤ä¸ªçš‡åå¤„åœ¨åŒä¸€æ–œçº¿ä¸Š        if (data[i] == data[n] || abs(data[n] - data[i]) == abs(i - n)){            return false        }    }    return true}//goLangæ²¡æœ‰æ•´æ•°çš„å–ç»å¯¹å€¼æ–¹æ³•  è‡ªå·±å†™ä¸€ä¸ªfunc abs(n int) int{    if (n < 0){        return -n    }    return n}

æ­¤å¤„éœ€æ›¿æ¢æˆçœŸå®çš„ï¼Œæ¢æˆä½ è‡ªå·±çš„cookie        }class Pixiv_DownLoad():    def get_proxy(self):        result = []        # è¯»å–ä»£ç†æ± ipå¹¶éšæœºè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ª        with open('ip_pool_foreign.txt', 'r') as f:            for line in f:                result.append(line.strip('\n'))        ips = list(filter(None, result))        proxies = {'http': random.choice(ips)}        return proxies    def illust_id(self,p):        global headers        params = {            'mode': 'daily',            'content': 'illust',            'p': p,            'format': 'json',        }        url = 'https://www.pixiv.net/ranking.php'  # pixivæ’ç”»æ’è¡Œæ¦œurl        totals = []        proxies = self.get_proxy()        headers['referer'] = 'https://www.pixiv.net/ranking.php?mode=daily&content=illust'        try:            response = requests.get(url=url,headers=headers,params=params,proxies=proxies).json()            for i in range(50):                try:                    target = response['contents'][i]['url']                    ex = 'https://i.pximg.net/c/240x480/img-master/img(.*?)_p0'  # ex çš†ä¸ºæ­£åˆ™çš„æ ¼å¼                    final = re.findall(ex, target)                    middle = final[0]   # middle ä¸ºä¸­é—´å˜é‡éšä¾¿å–çš„                    ex2 = '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]'                    name = re.search(ex2, middle).group(0)  # ç”¨æ­£åˆ™æå–å‡ºpixivID                    final_url = f"https://i.pximg.net/img-master/img{final[0]}_p0_master1200.jpg" # æ‹¼æ¥url                    m = (final_url,name)                    totals.append(m)                except IndexError:                    print('çˆ¬å–å·²å®Œæˆ')        except:            proxies = self.get_proxy()            response = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, params=params, proxies=proxies).json()            for i in range(50):                try:                    target = response['contents'][i]['url']                    ex = 'https://i.pximg.net/c/240x480/img-master/img(.*?)_p0'  # ex çš†ä¸ºæ­£åˆ™çš„æ ¼å¼                    final = re.findall(ex, target)                    middle = final[0]  # middle ä¸ºä¸­é—´å˜é‡éšä¾¿å–çš„                    ex2 = '[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]'                    name = re.search(ex2, middle).group(0)  # ç”¨æ­£åˆ™æå–å‡ºpixivID                    final_url = f"https://i.pximg.net/img-master/img{final[0]}_p0_master1200.jpg"  # æ‹¼æ¥url                    m = (final_url, name)                    totals.append(m)                except IndexError:                    print('çˆ¬å–å·²å®Œæˆ')        return totals #è¿”å›æœ€ç»ˆå›¾ç‰‡urlï¼Œä»¥åŠpixivID    def img_download(self,target_url,name):        global headers        path = os.getcwd()        if not os.path.exists(f"{path}" + "\\\\pic_downloaded"):            os.mkdir(f"{path}" + "\\\\pic_downloaded")        file_path = f"{path}" + f"\\pic_downloaded\\{name}.jpg"        with open(file_path, 'wb+') as f:            try:                proxies = self.get_proxy()                headers['referer'] = f'https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/{name}'                f.write(requests.get(url=target_url,headers=headers,proxies=proxies).content)                # time.sleep(random.randint(2,5))                print('æˆåŠŸä¸‹è½½å›¾ç‰‡ï¼š{}.jpg'.format(name))            except Exception:                print('æˆåŠŸä¸‹è½½å›¾ç‰‡ï¼š{}.jpg'.format(name))download = Pixiv_DownLoad()for p in range(1, 12):   # å¯ä»¥ä¿®æ”¹è¿™é‡Œ p çš„å¾ªç¯èŒƒå›´ï¼ˆæ¯50å¼ ä¸€ä¸ªpï¼‰    try:        total = download.illust_id(p=p)        time.sleep(random.randint(10, 20))  # éšæœºç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´        for target_url,name in total:            download.img_download(target_url,name)    except IndexError:        print('æ‰€æœ‰å›¾ç‰‡å·²çˆ¬å–å®Œæˆ')    print(f'å¾ªç¯åˆ°ç¬¬{p}é¡µäº†å“¦ï¼')   # entry.title: ascii_art
entry.content:
asciiå­—ç¬¦ç”»

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFontimport argparseimport numpy as npsample_rate = 0.4def ascii_art(file):    im = Image.open(file)    # Compute letter aspect ratio    font = ImageFont.load_default()    # font = ImageFont.truetype("SourceCodePro-Bold.ttf", size=12)    aspect_ratio = font.getsize("x")[0] / font.getsize("x")[1]    new_im_size = np.array(        [im.size[0] * sample_rate, im.size[1] * sample_rate * aspect_ratio]    ).astype(int)    # Downsample the image    im = im.resize(new_im_size)    # Keep a copy of image for color sampling    im_color = np.array(im)    # Convert to gray scale image    im = im.convert("L")    # Convert to numpy array for image manipulation    im = np.array(im)    # Defines all the symbols in ascending order that will form the final ascii    symbols = np.array(list(" .-vM"))    # Normalize minimum and maximum to [0, max_symbol_index)    im = (im - im.min()) / (im.max() - im.min()) * (symbols.size - 1)    # Generate the ascii art    ascii = symbols[im.astype(int)]    # Create an output image for drawing ascii text    letter_size = font.getsize("x")    im_out_size = new_im_size * letter_size    bg_color = "black"    im_out = Image.new("RGB", tuple(im_out_size), bg_color)    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(im_out)    # Draw text    y = 0    for i, line in enumerate(ascii):        for j, ch in enumerate(line):            color = tuple(im_color[i, j])  # sample color from original image            draw.text((letter_size[0] * j, y), ch[0], fill=color, font=font)        y += letter_size[1]  # increase y by letter height    # Save image file    im_out.save(file + ".ascii.png")if __name__ == "__main__":    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Convert any image to ascii art.")    parser.add_argument(        "file", type=str, help="input image file",    )    args = parser.parse_args()    ascii_art(args.file)# for i in range(1,6571):#     while len(str(i)) != 5:#         i = "0"+ str(i)#     v = "badapple/",f"foo-0{i}",".jpeg"

3ï¼é›¶å®½åº¦è´Ÿé¢„æµ‹å…ˆè¡Œæ–­è¨€ (?!exp)åŒ¹é…åé¢è·Ÿçš„ä¸æ˜¯expçš„ä½ç½®

ä¾‹ï¼šä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š\d{3}(?!\d)åŒ¹é…ä¸‰ä½æ•°å­—ï¼Œè€Œä¸”è¿™ä¸‰ä½æ•°å­—çš„åé¢ä¸èƒ½æ˜¯æ•°å­—ï¼›\b((?!abc)\w)+\båŒ¹é…ä¸åŒ…å«è¿ç»­å­—ç¬¦ä¸²abcçš„å•è¯ã€‚

# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-# é›¶å®½æ–­è¨€import res = r'eating apple seeing paper watching movie'm1 = re.findall(r'(\b\w+?)ing',s)print(m1) #['eat', 'see', 'watch']m2 = re.findall(r'(.+?)(?=ing)',s)print(m2)  #['eat', 'ing apple see', 'ing paper watch']m3 = re.findall(r'(.+?)(?<=ing)',s)print(m3)  #['eating', ' apple seeing', ' paper watching']s = 'unite one unethical ethics use untie ultimate'm4 = re.findall(r'\b(?!un)\w+\b',s)print(m4)  #['one', 'ethics', 'use', 'ultimate']m5 = re.findall(r'(?<![a-z])\d{3,}','abc123,123,4567')print(m5)  #['123', '4567']

#  -*- coding: utf-8  -*-# 1.å…ˆåšä¸€ä¸ªå­—å…¸å­˜ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®accounts = {}# 2.å°†æ–‡æ¡£ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®å†™å…¥å­—å…¸f = open("account.db","r",encoding="utf-8")for line in f :    line = line.strip().split(",")    accounts[line[0]] = line# print(accounts)# 3.æä¸ª loop è¦æ±‚ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥ä¿¡æ¯å»åˆ¤æ–­print("-----ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•-----")while True:                              #åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·åçŠ¶æ€    user = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š").strip()    if user not in accounts:        print("ç”¨æˆ·åä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚")        continue    elif  accounts[user][2] == "1":        print(f"{user}æ­¤è´¦æˆ·å·²è¢«é”å®šï¼Œè¯·è”ç³»ç®¡ç†å‘˜ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚")        continue    count = 0    while count < 3:                      #æ§åˆ¶å¯†ç ï¼ˆåˆ¤æ–­å¯†ç æ­£ç¡®å¦ï¼Œä¸‰æ¬¡é”å®šï¼‰        password = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ï¼š").strip()        if password ==  accounts[user][1]:            print(f"welcome'{user}'...ç™»å…¥æˆåŠŸã€‚ã€‚ã€‚")        else:            print("å¯†ç è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯è¯·é‡è¯•ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚")        count += 1    if count == 3 and password != accounts[user][1] :   #å°bugï¼Œå°±æ˜¯è¾“é”™ä¸¤æ¬¡ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡æ­£ç¡®ä¹Ÿä¼šé”å·        print(f"è¾“é”™äº†{count}æ¬¡å¯†ç ï¼Œè´¦å·{user}å·²é”å®šã€‚ã€‚ã€‚") #å¿…é¡»è¡¥å……æ¡ä»¶        # 1.å…ˆæ”¹åœ¨å†…å­˜ä¸­dict è´¦å·ä¿¡æ¯çš„ç”¨æˆ·çŠ¶æ€        # 2.æŠŠdicté‡Œçš„æ•°æ®è½¬æˆåŸaccount.dbæ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå¹¶å­˜å›æ–‡ä»¶        accounts[user][2] = "1"        f_new =open("account.db","w",)        for user,val in accounts.items(): #å­—å…¸è½¬åˆ—è¡¨            line = ",".join(val) + "\n"  #æŠŠåˆ—è¡¨å†è½¬æˆå­—ç¬¦            f_new.write(line)        f_new.close()    else:        pass        exit("bye...")

æ³¨å†Œï¼š

f = open("account.db", mode="a+")  # a+ æ¨¡å¼å…‰æ ‡é»˜è®¤æ”¾ç½®åœ¨æœ«å°¾ï¼Œå¤ªè‰¹äº†ï¼Œå¡äº†å¥½ä¹…f.seek(0)   #å°†å…‰æ ‡ç§»è‡³å¼€å¤´accounts = {} #ç©ºå­—å…¸å­˜æ•°æ®for line in f :             #å°†æ•°æ®ä»æ–‡ä»¶è¯»åˆ°å­—å…¸ï¼ˆä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯åŠ è½½åˆ°å†…å­˜ï¼‰    line = line.strip().split(",")    accounts[line[0]] = line#print(accounts)print("------ç”¨æˆ·æ³¨å†Œ------")user = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š")while f"{user}" in accounts.keys():  #æ¯”å¯¹ç”¨æˆ·åæ˜¯å¦é‡å¤    print("ç”¨æˆ·åå·²å­˜åœ¨è¯·é‡è¯•...")    user = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š")print(f"ç”¨æˆ·åä¸ºï¼š{user}")password = Nonepassword2 = "None@!$@#@$$##%$%#"while password != password2:            #äºŒæ¬¡è¾“å…¥éªŒè¯    password = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ï¼š").strip()    if len(password) < 6 or len(password) > 16:   #å­—æ•°é™åˆ¶        print("ä¸ç¬¦åˆå¯†ç è§„èŒƒè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥ï¼ˆ6-16ä¸ªå­—æˆ–æ‹¼éŸ³ï¼‰")        continue    password2 = input("è¯·å†æ¬¡è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ï¼š").strip()    if password != password2:        print("ä¸¤æ¬¡è¾“å…¥çš„å¯†ç ä¸ç›¸åŒè¯·é‡è¯•ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚")print(f"æ­å–œæ‚¨æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸ...ç”¨æˆ·åä¸ºï¼š{user}")data_base = f"{user},{password2},0"f.write(f"\n{data_base}")f.close()

åˆ—è¡¨æ¨å¯¼å¼

# åˆ—è¡¨æ¨å¯¼å¼  æ ¼å¼ï¼š[è¡¨è¾¾å¼ for å˜é‡ in æ—§åˆ—è¡¨] æˆ–è€… [è¡¨è¾¾å¼ for å˜é‡ in æ—§åˆ—è¡¨ if æ¡ä»¶]names = ['tom','lili','abc','jack','steven','luise','bob','ha']result = [name for name in names if len(name) > 3]        # è¿‡æ»¤æ‰é•¿åº¦å°äºæˆ–ç­‰äº3çš„äººåprint(result)    # ['lili', 'jack', 'steven', 'luise']result = [name.capitalize() for name in names if len(name) > 3]   # .capitalize()æ–¹æ³• é¦–å­—æ¯å¤§å†™ or .title()print(result)    # ['Lili', 'Jack', 'Steven', 'Luise']# åº•å±‚å®ç°'''def func(names):    newlist = []    for name in names :        name = name.title()        newlist.append(name)      return newlist'''# å°†1-100ä¹‹é—´èƒ½è¢«3æ•´é™¤çš„ç»„æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„åˆ—è¡¨newlist = [i for i in range(1,101) if i % 3 == 0 % 5 == 0 ]print(newlist)list = [[1,3,5],[2,4,6],[3,6,9]]newlist = [i[-1] for i in list]print(newlist)   #[5, 6, 9]''' ç›¸å½“äº:for i in list :    newlist.append(i[-1])'''# -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------# åˆ—è¡¨å¥—å­—å…¸çš„å®ç°ï¼šdict1 = {'name':'tom','salary':5000}dict2 = {'name':'lucy','salary':8000}dict3 = {'name':'jack','salary':4500}dict4 = {'name':'lily','salary':3000}list1 = [dict1,dict2,dict3,dict4]  # [ {} , {} , {} , {} ]# if è–ªèµ„å¤§äº5000åŠ 200 ï¼Œä½äºç­‰äº5000åŠ 500newlist = [employee['salary'] + 200 if employee['salary'] > 5000 else employee['salary'] + 200 for employee in list1]print(newlist)  # [5200, 8200, 4700, 3200]
